### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to each other before attempting to connect them.
- Make sure that the connection points of the entities are not occupied by other entities.

### Errors when inserting items
- Check if the item is available in the inventory before attempting to insert it.
- Ensure that the entity has enough space to hold the item.

### Errors when using offshore pumps and boilers
- Make sure that the offshore pump is connected to a boiler and that the boiler has enough fuel to operate.
- Ensure that the offshore pump is working and that the boiler is not out of fuel.

### Errors when using pipes
- Make sure that the pipes are connected to the correct entities and that they are not blocked by other entities.
- Ensure that the pipes are part of a valid fluid system.

### Errors when using electricity
- Make sure that the electricity network is connected to a power source and that the network is not broken.
- Ensure that the electricity network is valid and that all entities are properly connected.
